pageProduct.name: OptiSlim VLCD Soup Tomato 7 x 55g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The Optislim VLCD (very low calorie diet) Tomato soup is a nutritionally balanced total meal replacement designed for people requiring a practical weight management program. It contains all your daily nutritional requirements, including 25 vitamins and minerals when you use three soups per day. Remember to maintain adequate fluid intake.  We recommend that a minimum of 2 litres of water is consumed per day

Warnings

This product should not be used by pregnant, nursing and lactating women or by infants, children and adolescents, except when medically indicated. Please be advised that if you have any  medical conditions, you should consult your Healthcare Professional prior to commencing a VLCD weight loss program

Ingredients

Milk Protein [Contains Soy Lecithin], Tomato Powder (16%) [Tomato, Anti-Caking Agent (551)], Fructose, Maltodextrin, Thickener (1422), Sugar, Sunflower Oil Powder [contains Milk Protein, Emulsifier (472c), Antioxidants (304, 306, 322, 472c)], Natural Flavours (contains Soy & Milk), Vitamins & Minerals [Calcium Hydrogen Phosphate, Potassium Dihydrogen Phosphate, Magnesium Oxide, Ferric Pyrophoshate, Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Maltodextrin, Chromium Chloride, Vitamin B3, Potassium Iodide, Sodium Molybdate, Sodium Selenite, Zinc Oxide, Vitamin A, Copper Sulphate, Vitamin B5, Vitamin D3, Manganese Sulphate, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin B12, Vitamin B2, Biotin, Vitamin B1], Food Acid (330), Herb & Spice, Salt, Potassium Chloride, Natural Colour (160c), Vegetable Powder. CONTAINS MILK AND MILK PRODUCTS, SOYBEANS AND THEIR PRODUCTS AND SULPHITES.

Directions

Add one 55g sachet to 200ml of hot water, do not use boiling water. Pour contents into a mug, add approximately 50ml of warm water and mix to form a thin paste then add 150ml of hot water and stir until dissolved. Drink immediately. Once prepared any unused portion of the soup should be discarded, it should not be stored for use at a later time. One serve of the Optislim VLCD soup can be replaced with one serve of any other product in the VLCD range.

To achieve a healthy weight it is important you live a healthy lifestyle. Whilst various products may be of assistance in achieving your weight loss aims, eating a healthy energy-controlled diet and ensuring you engage in sufficient and appropriate physical activity will help you on your journey to a healthier you.
